content:
────────────────────────────────
**Summary**
• Hyperliquid, a popular DEX, is launching its own stablecoin.
• This move could shake up the DeFi landscape with new liquidity tools.
• The stablecoin is part of Hyperliquid’s plan to dominate decentralized trading.

Impact — Hyperliquid’s stablecoin launch could redefine DeFi trading and liquidity.

────────────────────────────────
Link: https://www.coindesk.com/tech/2025/09/05/hyperliquid-moves-forward-to-launch-proprietary-stablecoin
